Name: Simple Twack
Description: You swing your weapon at the enemy

Name: Magical Twang
Description: You twang your weapon against enemy and it oozes out magical energy

Name: Ground Slam
Description: The enemy jumps into the air ferociously and lands on the floor with a thud. Dust and smoke are flung outwards carpeting anything and blinding them

Name: Rend
Description: You jump at the enemy gnawing at their skin and bones.

Name: Flay
Description: You jump at your enemy, tearing their skin to shreds causing their flesh to fall apart

Name: Devour
Description: The enemy bites you and sinks their teeth into your flesh
